pr_title: #10045 Packing instructions are no longer displayed when ordering

timeline.message: #10045 Use sys config for skipping enforcing M_HU_PI_Item_Product_ID in product price
#10045 Correct the name of sys config

timeline.bodyText: move this sysconfig to de.metas.ui.web.quickinput.field.PackingItemProductFieldHelper and call it de.metas.ui.web.quickinput.field.PackingItemProductFieldHelper.EnforcePrecisePricePerHUItemProduct.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText: do this checking in de.metas.ui.web.quickinput.field.PackingItemProductFieldHelper and decide there if u set queryVO's priceListVersionId.
timeline.author: teosarca

timeline.bodyText: not sure this will work with Client level sysconfigs....
timeline.author: teosarca

replies.bodyText: Agree. Tested and fixed it! Thx!
